On Escalation Ticket # 00414197 the new comment has been added: Alex Puskas:

Please try to check under "Peer Certificate Validation" all the check boxes. If all the checkboxes will be checked, I think the peer certificate validation will be OFF.

(this is releated to a bug which was introduced in patch 593 (the received configuration is wrong)

The mentioned problem persists only with the public.cyber.mil URL?


I think you should try to also allowlist/whitelist:
*cyber.mil
*.cyber.mil
